About LuxeVista Resort

Nestled on the pristine coastline, LuxeVista Resort offers world-class amenities, breathtaking ocean views, and exceptional hospitality. Enjoy our infinity pool, gourmet dining, and relaxing spa for an unforgettable stay.

Contact: +94 77 123 4567 | +94 11 234 5678
Email: info@luxevista.com
Address: 123 Paradise Road, Galle, Sri Lanka
